news.title: A paper accepted to NeurIPS 2025
news.summary: 1 paper from VILAB is accepted to NeurIPS 2025.

news.title: Papers accepted to CVPR 2025
news.summary: 4 papers and 1 workshop paper from VILAB are accepted to CVPR 2025.

news.title: NVIDIA Korea Internship Participation News
news.summary: VILab member Yujeong Chae participated in the NVIDIA Korea internship program.
news.description: Ph.D student Yujeong Chae got the opportunity to participate in the NVIDIA Korea internship as an engineering intern to gain extensive experience. Congratulations!

people.name: Yujeong Chae
people.career: engineering intern in the NVIDIA Korea internship program
